title: New Directions in Metal Clay (2007) Pdf Gooner
description:
Publisher: Lark Books (August 1, 2007)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1579904890
ISBN-13: 978-1579904890

Metal clay is the most exciting material in jewelry design today: the procedures for molding and shaping are simple, the tools few, and the results stunning. CeCe Wire, a leader in the field, details all the newest innovations and clays, as well as the basics for beginners. She includes every form and formula, plus an extensive array of cutting-edge techniques that range from stone-setting to surface finishing. Numerous color photos showcase diverse possibilities, including enameling methods such as champlevÃƒÂ©, inlaying with epoxy resin, and silk screening.
